text: 2.2: Sng 68.17Fhe Bakɨme fhum wo bunin won enseri ga ndɨɨim, mbe mba bunin nzan nzɨgi ga suaŋgi. Mba buni, nta guigi guarara. Mba buni zɨn vui fhuv gumgi, mbe tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui, mbe mba mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi tugɨra tɨgap vheza mbatɨga ndi.2.2 Kha ves, ana Fhe Bakɨme Moses ga nɨɨŋgi tɨvi ga nzuai. Ndu Taagia Ndi o, Kisim Bek 19.20 ganɨri. Ndu taagia ndi gavar ki buni, nta Fhe Bakɨme enseri ga nzuai fhuvara. Mbe Zudaiŋ, mbe khueŋ khothɨgi, Fhe Bakɨme Moses ga nɨɨŋgi tɨvi, ana ntan won enser mbe nɨɨŋgim, ana ntan Moses ga nɨɨŋgi. Ndu FG 7.53 ganɨri. Ndu vhɨra Ga 3.19 ganɨri.
